actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 95-490.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution to permit all employees of the House of Representatives to contribute, through payroll withholdings, to charitable organizations in coordination with the Combined Federal Campaign and other fund raising in the executive branch of the Federal Government.

summary.text: Authorizes the Clerk of the House of Representatives to withhold charitable contributions from the pay of House employees for transmittal to the Combined Federal Campaign, if the employee requests the Clerk to do so.

titles.title: A resolution to permit all employees of the House of Representatives to contribute, through payroll withholdings, to charitable organizations in coordination with the Combined Federal Campaign and other fund raising in the executive branch of the Federal Government.
